text: Petrovskoye () is a rural locality (a village) in Kaltovsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 15 as of 2010. In the district there are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 24 km from Iglino, 10 km from Kaltovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Petrovskoye, Iglinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
